summary.span: 命名空间包含用于播放声音文件和访问系统提供的声音的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes for playing sound files and accessing sounds provided by the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间中包括以下类：The following classes are included in this namespace: - A用于加载和播放声音各种文件格式的类。A class for loading and playing sounds in various file formats. - A类用于表示和播放系统声音。A class for representing and playing a system sound. - A检索与 Windows 操作系统声音事件类型的一组相关的声音的类。A class that retrieves sounds associated with a set of Windows operating system sound-event types.
